byline.contributor: Jo Becker contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Arrest of Harold T Martin III on suspicion of stealing classified information from National Security Agency has renewed scrutiny on Booz Allen Hamilton, intelligence consulting firm that employed Martin; company, which also employed Edward Snowden, has influence in every branch of United States military.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Booz Allen Hamilton, the firm that employed the contractor accused of stealing secrets from the National Security Agency, earns billions of dollars each year in intelligence work.
snippet: Booz Allen Hamilton, the firm that employed the contractor accused of stealing secrets from the National Security Agency, earns billions of dollars each year in intelligence work....

headline.main: At Booz Allen, a Vast U.S. Spy Operation, Run for Private Profit
headline.print_headline: Another Security Breach Shines a Light on Booz Allen’s Ubiquitous Spy Business
